review: I purchased this mainly for access to Plex and I have been nothing but frustrated.The unit constantly crashes and there is no support for 5.1. I know it doesn't play MKV but that doesn't matter so much as all my content is converted to MP4. So I get stereo sound or no sound at all.I don't have these problems with my Roku.Also I paid $2.99 for the Plex app and then a week later it is up there for free.It seems there are some work arounds to side load apps, but I don't have the time or patience to hack it up to make it work.
